snippet.title: perino Trailer
snippet.description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3319050/Perino_Candy_Buster/

Dive into the vibrant world of Perino Ball Buster, an action-packed arcade game that combines classic Block Breaker gameplay with a delightful twist! Join Porino and friends on a whimsical adventure filled with colorful graphics, engaging stories, and competitive local multiplayer.
